thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 26 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Axsome Therapeutics Says Independent Committee Recommends Continuation Of Depression Trial

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Axsome Therapeutics Says Independent Committee Recommends Continuation Of Depression Trial

organizations.name: axsome therapeutics says independent committee recommends continuation of depression trial

text:
April 26 (Reuters) - Axsome Therapeutics Inc:
* AXSOME THERAPEUTICS ANNOUNCES POSITIVE OUTCOME OF INTERIM ANALYSIS OF STRIDE-1 PHASE 3 TRIAL OF AXS-05 IN TREATMENT RESISTANT DEPRESSION
* AXSOME THERAPEUTICS INC - SECOND INTERIM ANALYSIS ANTICIPATED SECOND HALF OF 2018 FOR EFFICACY
* AXSOME THERAPEUTICS INC - INDEPENDENT DATA MONITORING COMMITTEE RECOMMENDS TRIAL CONTINUATION
* AXSOME THERAPEUTICS INC - IDMC ALSO REVIEWED AVAILABLE SAFETY INFORMATION FROM STUDY AND INDICATED AXS-05 APPEARED SAFE AND WELL-TOLERATED Source text for Eikon:
